channel.title: [562] How to Remove hackers from your Server [562]
channel.description:
Do you got players that get admin when they login? do you got players that demote you? do you want to fix?
[b]Here is the Problem[/b] find actionsender.java and search for 'Right' then you will see 2 lines with someones name in it. Example: victorious, harry123. Save, Compile and your done!
[b][i]ITS NOOB FRIENDLEY SO DONT FLAME PLEASE :D[/i][/b]
~ferat
